body_html:
For windows, we currently do native compilation with cmake, (no cygwin).
Bazel setup for windows uses msys2, which is the closest thing we have to cygwin, but that also uses visual studio to compile TF.
body_text:
For windows, we currently do native compilation with cmake, (no cygwin).
Bazel setup for windows uses msys2, which is the closest thing we have to cygwin, but that also uses visual studio to compile TF.
body:
For windows, we currently do native compilation with cmake, (no cygwin).
Bazel setup for windows uses msys2, which is the closest thing we have to cygwin, but that also uses visual studio to compile TF.
